project.name: Transformers Battle Arena
project.description: A browser-based 3D game where players build and battle robots

code_conventions.comments: JSDoc style for functions, inline for complex logic
code_conventions.naming: camelCase for variables/functions, PascalCase for classes/components

architecture.state_management: Redux for global state, React context for UI states
architecture.asset_loading: Progressive loading with preloaded essential assets
architecture.world_structure: Zone-based city environment with dynamic loading
architecture.enemy_ai: Behavior tree implementation with difficulty scaling

priorities: Consistent frame rates during physics interactions
Clear visual feedback for all actions
Performant effects even during intense battles
